entry.title: Farmhouse Fig by Modern Farmhouse Family Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Farmhouse Fig is a bright medley of sweet plum, blackberry, and rhubarb, wrapped in a fresh bouquet of fig leaves, wild florals, and cozy woods. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Sarah @ModernFarmhouseFamily!

"The combination of fruits, florals, and the outdoors makes Farmhouse Fig the perfect fragrance to burn year round...Once you smell this candle, I really believe you will fall in love the way I already have."

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 hours total).

This fresh and floral fragrance features a moderate strength that perfectly blends both brightness and warmth to create a uniquely cozy atmosphere in your home.


INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.
Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Fluffy Coffee is a warm, sweet blend of almond cream intertwined with delicious white chocolate, caramel, vanilla bean, and a splash of espresso, topped with extra fluffy whipped cream and rich cinnamon.

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

entry.title: Country Home by Allie Boss Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Country Home is the feeling of “home, sweet home.” The sweet scents of apple and pear highlighted by nostalgic cedar and pine are like driving along the back roads of the countryside, between orchards and woods that lead to a cozy happy place full of love, warmth, and a little bit of spice. This NEW fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Allie @alliemboss!

“The sweet blend of pomegranate and orange with hints of clove and cinnamon sticks are the perfect pairing that are equally warm as they are inviting. You will love how this set fills a room and keeps you coming back for more!”

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 hours total). This fruity and spiced fragrance features a moderate strength that perfectly blends warm and bright notes to create a warm, cozy space you’ll love.


INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: North Shore by Ellery Designs 8 oz candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 8 oz Candle
Price: 28.00

North Shore is a refreshing, shore-side breeze intertwined with sweet pear and earthy blends of balsam woods, oakmoss, and driftwood, highlighted by subtle aromas of bright citrus and soothing amber. This scent is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Michelle @ellerydesigns!

“Reminds me of walking along the north shore at dusk on a 65 degree day while inhaling the crisp air, high tides, driftwood + moss. As it burns down, it becomes very spa-like and serene. It’s crisp, clean, cozy, and just perfect!”

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 40 hours of burn time. This This fresh and earthy fragrance features a moderate strength that instantly takes you to a lakeside shore on a breezy day.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 6.9 oz (195.8 g)

DIMENSIONS: 3.5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy Coastal Linen in additional sizes and products.

entry.title: Earl Grey by To Mimi's House We Go 8 oz candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 8 oz Candle
Price: 28.00

Earl Grey is a warm, cozy aroma of freshly brewed Earl Grey tea with soothing notes of citrus and bergamot peel, blended with creamy coconut milk, vanilla bean, and sugar. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive collaboration with our friend Tina @to_mimi’shousewego!

“Earl Grey is earthy and warm and reminds me of sitting in my Pop Pop’s leather book-filled study with him as a little girl while he drinks his tea and I drink my “tea milk.” The perfect blend of comforting tea, citrus, and creamy vanilla.”

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 40 hours of burn time. This fresh and earthy fragrance features a moderate strength that will have you daydreaming of cozy evenings, snuggled up in front of a warm fire with a warm, freshly brewed cup of tea.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 6.9 oz (195.8 g)

DIMENSIONS: 3.5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy Earl Grey in additional sizes and products.

entry.title: Mixed Berry Crumble by Karlee Gail Bowman Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Mixed Berry Crumble is a sweet medley of fresh blueberries and raspberries, blended with rich, freshly baked notes of buttery caramel, brown sugar, and warm vanilla. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Karlee @karleegailbowman!

“The thing about this candle is that something magical happens when you light it. At first, I smelled the berries. But once it is lit, it's like that butter just starts melting and the brown sugar wakes up and it is just so, so good! I love it.”

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 hours total). This fruity and bakey fragrance features a moderate strength that captures the mouth-watering aroma of sweet, freshly baked crumble straight from your grandma’s kitchen.


INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g) per candle
DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

entry.title: Momma's Kitchen Gift Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Gift
Price: 55.00

Gifting just got easier with our Momma's Kitchen Gift Set!


Momma’s Kitchen is a warm and cozy blend of green apples, bright peach, and fresh pine, highlighted with a heart of cinnamon and notes of sweet balsamic spice. With up to 64 hours of burn time in our 16 oz candle, this spiced and bakey fragrance features a strong strength that captures the nostalgic aroma of homemade treats baked with love. Paired with our branded Wick Trimmer and an adorable Safety Matchbox.

Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting, and even burn. We use premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!) and 100% lead-free cotton wicks. All candles are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This hand-picked fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.


*Products containing matches are unable to be shipped to addresses in Alaska and Hawaii at this time.*

entry.title: Vanilla Spice Latte by To Mimi's House We Go Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Vanilla Spice Latte is a delightfully spiced scent of cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger with a cozy, warm blend of fresh espresso, maple brown sugar, and vanilla cream. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Tina @to_mimi’shousewego!

"Vanilla Spice Latte captures that feeling of snuggling up with a warm drink and a good book. The spicy notes blend perfectly with sweet vanilla cream and espresso undertones to create a homey atmosphere I know you'll love as much as I do!"

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”
